attributes.action: Review the UK's Overseas Aid Policy.
attributes.additional_details: Review all overseas aid, Weed out corrupt recipients, Stop aid to countries that spend money on extravagant schemes rather than looking after it's citizens and infrastructure. If we keep aiding these countries they will never put there house in order. North Korea, China, India, Pakistan, Somalia are just a few of the undeserving countries that are milking our economy. They are corrupt, they are hostile to the west, the money is indirectly being used to do us harm. It must be looked at.
